change1: - Added: The Ai Analysis models 'mistrel', 'codegemma', 'gemma', 'deepseek-coder' and 'phi3' have been added.
change2: - Added: The model name and object name are now displayed with the Ai analysis response.
change3: - Added: The message that the analysis is running in the background has been animated for awareness.
change4: - Added: The pulldown menus for selecting a single object now includes "None" so that it can be used to clear the selection without having to resort to a 'Reset Settings' in the GUI.
change5: - Added: Three additional Tasker preferences have been mapped and one has been corrected.
change7: - Changed: Ai models are now listed alphabetically, with the last-used model listed first.  The default of 'None (llama)' has been removed.
change9: - Fixed: The 'ReRun' command caused the error message: 'Task policy set failed...'.
change10: - Fixed: If doing a single object (Project/Profile/Task)and doing Tasker Preferences, Preferences were empty.  Display appropriate message in output.
change11: - Fixed: Getting XML file from Android device did not reset the local file pointer, causing a conflict between the two.
